title: Roast courgette and tomato salad
ingredients: ['2 to 4 courgettes, sliced lenghways', '6 to 8 small tomatoes, sliced in half', '3/4 tablespoon rapeseed oil', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 handful shaved Parmesan cheese', '1 handful salad leaves, such as rocket, beetroot leaves, spinach', 'Naked JamÂ® red onion marmalade']
